header.title: CosTransactions_Synchronization

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosTransactions::Synchronization interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosTransactions/CosTransactions.hrl").

func.name: before_completion(Synchronization) -> Return
func.fsummary: Notify the target object that the transaction is about to enter the prepare phase

desc.p: If the target object is a transaction using the operation register_synchronization/2 it will be notified to perform necessary processing prior to the prepare phase.

func.name: after_completion(Synchronization) -> Return
func.fsummary: Notify the target object that the transaction is completed

desc.p: If the target object is a transaction using the operation register_synchronization/2 it will be notified to perform necessary processing after terminating the transaction.
